meanings.sent1: I picked a fresh cocozelle from the garden for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The cocozelle added a delicious crunch to the salad.
meanings.sent3: The cocozelle rolled off the table and bounced down the stairs!
meanings.sent4: Her hair was as vibrant and curly as a cocozelle in the sun.
meanings.sent5: The cocozelle's bright green color made it stand out among the vegetables.

meanings.definition: To cook or prepare in a certain way, typically involving slicing and sautéing.
meanings.sent1: She decided to cocozelle the zucchini for a quick stir-fry.
meanings.sent2: The chef will cocozelle the vegetables before adding them to the pasta.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally cocozelled the onions too thin and they turned into onion rings!
meanings.sent4: The aroma of garlic cocozelling in the pan filled the kitchen.
meanings.sent5: The sound of vegetables cocozelling in the skillet was music to her ears.
